column1: Nobody wanted to come with me, so I went ...
I know I should put ... some time for myself, but I just can't afford to spend time relaxing
A ... is never a bad experience, just another one of life's lessons.
Audiences complain of incessant intrusion and distraction from ... advertisements.
Please rephrase the sentence using inverted conditional: Please contact me if you have any questions
column2: Please contact me should you have any questions
